alert.note: Alert for Clay; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 6:36AM MDT until May 11 at 7:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CLAY AND NORTHEASTERN YANKTON COUNTIES... At 736 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wakonda, or 14 miles northeast of Yankton, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Irene around 745 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gayville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
